text:
The ground is flat, big, wide, and is in rectangular shape. The only downside: no water point , you have to bring your own water bottle to keep your fur kid hydrate.

Overall, the ground condition and size is better than Dog Run @ Punggol Waterway Park

The dog park is big playground which is flat, big, wide, and is in rectangular shape. The only downside: no water point , you have to bring your own water bottle to keep your fur kid hydrate.

U can rest on a few bench

Overall, the ground condition and size is better well maintained than Dog Run @ Punggol Park

Worst Dog Run. So unkempt - ANTS everywhere and grass uncut. No wonder no dogs here when we came. Dont bring your dogs here till NParks do something about this place. We will never come back again, ever!

Dog park for medium and small dogs. There are a few large dogs, so smaller dog owners need to beware. Some are not friendly also.

Large field, quite clean, owners all pretty considerate and chill. There is also a dog friendly cafe nearby, but quite ex.

Nice place to go to on the weekends.

May get pretty muddy on rainy weather, but otherwise great place for dogs to play.

My little grand furkid had a fantastic time at this dog run

Well maintained!

Nearby walk was very joyous too!
